General.Name: Richmond Minerals Inc
General.Description: Richmond Minerals Inc. engages in the exploration and development of base and precious metals in Canada and Austria. The company explores for gold, silver, copper, cobalt, barium, lithium, nickel, lead, antimony, manganese, zinc, and graphite. Its primary project is the Ridley Lake Gold property, which consists of 196 contiguous mining claims located in Rollo and Raney Townships, Ontario. The company was founded in 1983 and is headquartered in Toronto, Canada.
General.Address: 120 Adelaide Street West, Toronto, ON, Canada, M5H 1T1
